'''Elytra''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Elytra}} – a torso armor piece which allows the player to glide through the air.
* {{ItemLink|Poisonous Polytra}} – a [[April Fools' Day jokes|joke]] variant of the elytra for [[24w14potato]], which features exactly the same as a regular elytra.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{DuItemLink|Elytra}} – are [[MCD:Consumable|consumable]] items that can be found within the [[MCD:Echoing Void|Echoing Void]] [[MCD:Downloadable Content|DLC]].

== ''Minecraft: Story Mode''==
* {{SMItemLink|Elytra}} – are a pair of wings that let the user glide through the air.

== ''Minecraft Blast'' ==
* [[Boosters (Blast)#Elytra|Elytra]], a booster.

== ''A Minecraft Movie'' ==
* {{MovieSprite|Elytra}} [[Movie:Elytra |Elytra]] – also referred to as '''elytra wingsuits''', are a pair of wings which appear in {{AMCM}}.
